Testing¶

This section documents the tests for the Heart Disease Prediction app. The tests are written using the unittest framework and ensure the correctness of the backend functionality.

### Unit Tests Unit tests are located in the test folder. They include tests for: - Route Testing: Ensuring that all routes (like /predict) return the correct responses. - Model Testing: Ensuring that the prediction model produces expected results with sample data.
